colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(MTHU LDAN BSRUNG MDZAD MGON PO'I SGRUB THABS 'DI, GUS LDAN DBU MDZAD CHOS KYI BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MTSAN LDAN BLA MA'I GSUNG BZHIN BRIS PA'I MTHUS, ,DON LDAN RNAM MKHYEN GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MI 'PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BAS CHOS LA BYUNG BAS CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYASPA DBU MDZAD CHOS RJE DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NAN TAN GYIS CHEN POS BSKUL NGOR MCHOG PAR RNAM GA-YENG GI KHOL POR RGAS PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYIS SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
